name: Fish Hooks Ronpa -- BETA PROLOGUE
description:
ALL CONTENT FEATURED IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

Fish Hooks Ronpa is a crossover between DanganRonpa and Disney's Fish Hooks... For some reason. When Mackerel Naegi gets accepted into the prestigious Fish Hope's Peak Academy, he is soon trapped and force to participate in a death game.

THINGS I HAVE TO FIX
-- Oscar's sprites are a bit oversized.
-- Some characters' intro screens have the text blocked out by the character's sprite.
